replies.body: how long do you have to be on avicus to be staff?
replies.body_tagged: how long do you have to be on avicus to be staff?

replies.body:
https://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=51 Here

Where it's has the orange 'Search' and blue 'Mark all Read' there will be a green 'New Discussion' and then you put your application there, only you and Senior Mods+ will be able to see it. Right now you don't have that green button, but when applications open (today) you'll see the green button.
Hope that makes sense.
